verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* behold Core \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isaar, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Caath, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiron \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hon \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Pheleth \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ruben,

\w Rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* others \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w leading|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* synagogue, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H8034"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* stood \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Let \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w enough|strong="H7227"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude consisteth \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w ones|strong="H6918"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* this, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Core \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* belong \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w join|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w himself|strong="H3045"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3947"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, thou Core, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w company|strong="H5712"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w putting|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* whomsoever \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*: \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w take|strong="H7760"\w* \w too|strong="H5921"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* again \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Core: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w thing|strong="H4592"\w* unto \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath spared \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* people, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w joined|strong="H0914"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* people, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*?

Did \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w* make thee \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* should challenge \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w company|strong="H5712"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* stand \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiron \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: We \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w matter|strong="H4592"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w flowed|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w except|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w rule|strong="H8323"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lord|strong="H8323"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?

Thou \w best|strong="H5869"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w indeed|strong="H0637"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* floweth \w with|strong="H0413"\w* rivers \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* possessions \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*; wilt thou \w also|strong="H0637"\w* pull \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*? \w We|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* being \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*, raid \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Respect|strong="H6437"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w*: thou knowest \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0259"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w much|strong="H3966"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* young ass \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* time, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* injured \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Core: \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* thou \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* stand apart \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* apart.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w offering|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H3947"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*: \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*.

\w When|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* done \w this|strong="H0376"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* drawn \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Separate|strong="H0914"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8432"\w* \w from|strong="H8432"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w that|strong="H8432"\w* \w I|strong="H7281"\w* may presently \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H0430"\w* most \w mighty|strong="H0410"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="H0376"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H7107"\w* rage \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*?
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w Command|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* whole \w people|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* separate \w themselves|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tents|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* Core \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1696"\w* Abiron.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Abiron: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude: \w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0408"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* theirs, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* involved \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiron \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* pavilions \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* forged \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* own head:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* standing \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cry|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* perishing: \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w destroyed|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*.
And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying:
Command Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest to take up the censers that lie in the burning, and to scatter the fire of one side and the other: because they are sanctified

In the deaths of the sinners: and let him beat them into plates, and fasten them to the altar, because incense hath been offered in them to the Lord, and they are sanctified, that the children of Israel may see them for a sign and a memorial.
Then Eleazar the priest took the brazen censers, wherein they had offered, whom the burning fire had devoured, and beat them into plates, fastening them to the altar:

That the children of Israel might have for the time to come wherewith they should be admonished, that no stranger or any one that is not of seed of Aaron should come near to offer incense to the Lord, lest he should suffer as Core suffered, and all his congregation, according as the Lord spoke to Moses.
The following day all the multitude of the children of Israel murmured against Moses and Aaron, saying: You have killed the people of the Lord.
And when there arose a sedition, and the tumult increased,
Moses and Aaron fled to the tabernacle of the covenant. And when the were gone into it, the cloud covered it, and the glory of the Lord appeared.
And the Lord said to Moses:
Get you out from the midst of this multitude, this moment will I destroy them. And as they were lying on the ground,

Moses said to Aaron: Take the censer, and putting fire in it from the altar, put incense upon it, and go quickly to the people to pray for them: for already wrath is gone out from the Lord, and the plague rageth.
When Aaron had done this, and had run to the midst of the multitude which the burning fire was now destroying, he offered the incense:
And standing between the dead and the living, he prayed for the people, and the plague ceased.
And the number of them that were slain was fourteen thousand and seven hundred men, besides them that had perished in the sedition of Core.
And Aaron returned to Moses to the door of the tabernacle of the covenant after the destruction was over.
